document_data.caption: The [[aarakocra]] port island of Athanar on the planet [[Coliar]].
document_data.name: Athanar
document_data.mainbody: '''Athanar''' was a major port of the planet [[Coliar]] in [[Realmspace]],
document_data.Description:
Athanar was an [[aarakocra]] [[spelljamming]] port. Like all land masses within the atmosphere of Coliar, Athanar was a floating island, one of many thousands.

The port contained several structures. A stream flowed through the town and poured off the edge to fall to unfathomable depths.
document_data.Government:
[[File:Athanar Congress Building Interior-PoR.png|thumb|right|''An [[aarakocra]] sits at a desk in the Congress building of Athanar.'']]
The aarakocra of Coliar maintained democractic governments. On Athanar, that government's business was centralized at the Congress building.
document_data.Trade: Athanar charged a moorage fee of 125 [[gold piece]]s and an exorbitant air tax of 200 gold pieces. An additional cargo tax was also charged, which was based on the amount of cargo being carried by mooring [[spelljammer]]s.
document_data.Religion:
[[File:Shrine of Syranita Interior-PoR.png|thumb|right|''A shrine to [[Syranita]] on Athanar.'']]
The islanders of Athanar were known to revere the god [[Syranita]], and the port contained at least one shrine dedicated to her.
